mapper.select: SELECT a.rsc_cd, a.rsc_nm, b.vend_cd, c.lot_cnt, a.saf_rtc FROM rsc_lot c, rsc a, rsc_ordr b WHERE a.rsc_cd = c.rsc_cd AND c.ordr_cd = b.ordr_cd
SELECT a.rsc_cd, a.rsc_nm, b.vend_cd, b.ordr_cd, c.ordr_cnt, c.paprd_cmnd_dt FROM rsc a, rsc_ordr b, rsc_ordr_dtl c WHERE a.rsc_cd = c.rsc_cd AND c.ordr_cd = b.ordr_cd

SELECT r.rsc_nm, r.rsc_typ, r.rsc_spec, r.rsc_unit, r.saf_rtc, r.rsc_avail, l.rsc_cd, SUM(l.lot_cnt) AS "lot_cnt" FROM rsc r, rsc_lot l WHERE r.rsc_cd = l.rsc_cd GROUP BY r.rsc_nm, r.rsc_typ, r.rsc_spec, r.rsc_unit, r.saf_rtc, r.rsc_avail, l.rsc_cd
SELECT ordr_cd, ordr_req_dt, vend_cd FROM rsc_ordr ORDER BY ordr_cd
SELECT ist_cd, rsc_cd, ist_cnt, ist_dt, ist_typ FROM rsc_ist ORDER BY ist_cd
SELECT rsc_oust_cd, rsc_cd, oust_dt, oust_typ, oust_cnt FROM rsc_oust ORDER BY rsc_oust_cd
SELECT rsc_insp_cd, ordr_cd, rsc_cd, insp_cnt, insp_pass_cnt, insp_fail_cnt FROM rsc_insp_dtl ORDER BY rsc_insp_cd
